item.title: LEIDEN API v0.0.0.3
item.description:
Product: LEIDEN API v0.0.0.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 28 Apr 2025 09:49:54 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Tools used by LevyLab to interact with Leiden Cryostats

Front Panel (FP) API:
- pushButton({Start, 3He, 4He, Normal, Recovery, Auto, Reset, LED Test})
- setMode({Auto Off, Start, Condense 3He, Condense 4He, Normal Circulation, Recovery})
- getMode()

Temperature Control (TC) API:
- getTemperature()
- setTemperature()
- setHeater()
- getHeater()

Release Notes: [0.0.0]
- Leiden API combining Leiden FP and TC API into one package
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.15.0.33
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.15.0.33
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 24 Apr 2025 15:12:22 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Framework for communicating with hardware (Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

Release Notes: [1.15.0] PLEASE READ: This version was built and compiled AFTER version 2.2.0, which used an experimental SMO 2.0 package. This version reverts to the 1.x branch and uses SMO v1.4. However, this release contains the following changes and improvements while developing 2.x:

[Issues]:
- #40: add get/set typedefs for params object
- #119: Debug Attribute
- #139: SMO 1.4 Error Handler
- #140: Macro: Exit
- #142: SMO 2.0 IS NOT USED, but Instrument Framework and Dependencies (Logger, RemoteControl, etc) will remain in lvlibs that were implemented during that round of development
- #144: Log Data Multiline
- #146: Refine HELP API
- #154: Bugfix in Get Hardware Address
- Issues #159, #160: Improvements to help loading of legacy projects that call deprecated methods

[untracked issues and improvements]:
- enable 32 and 64 bit labview
- bugfix: do not shutdown on unhandled error
- bugfix: rename HELP request object "Command" to "command"
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

Release Notes: [1.2.0]
- Issue #143: store libzmq*.dll inside libzmq*.lvclass
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: RemoteControl v1.3.0.12
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl v1.3.0.12
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 24 Apr 2025 11:02:41 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Parent library for sending messages to programs occupying different application instances, ie, LabVIEW running on different computers, multiple instances of LabVIEW on a single computer, or compiled applications. By itself this library does not implement a specific or even working communication protocol, but provides abstract methods that can be overridden by, for example, ZMQ, MQTT, etc.

Release Notes: [1.3.0]
- #119: Update Macro: Debug
- #139: verify Error Handler
- #140: verify Macro: Exit
- #162: change to SMO v1.4
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
